cat('\n![', AALComp_mod1[plot.vec[a],caption_col], ' \\label{fig:nwfsc_combo_andre_',a,'}](r4ss/plots_mod1/', AALComp_mod1[plot.vec[a], path_col], ')\n', sep='')
}

plot.vec = c(1:2)
for(a in 1:length(plot.vec)){
#NWFSC Combo - Andre plots
cat('\n![', AALComp_mod1[plot.vec[a],caption_col], ' \\label{fig:nwfsc_combo_pearson_',a,'}](r4ss/plots_mod1/', AALComp_mod1[plot.vec[a], path_col], ')\n', sep='')
}
